DOC.brief_title: Prospective Data Collection Cementless Oxford Partial Knee
DOC.detailed_description: Prospective radiographic clinical data collection outcomes Cementless oxford Partial Knee . Screened radiograph take postoperatively 12 month . Oxford Knee Scores , SF12 Health Questionnaires American Knee Society Radiographic Assessment take 12 month follow-up .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Patients undergo primary knee arthroplasty 2 . Patients one follow primary diagnosis medial compartment knee : Osteoarthritis , Avascular necrosis Exclusion criterion : 1 . Inability cooperate complete study . 2 . Inadequate fixation cementless component . If either randomization surgeon feel cementless fixation inadequate , cement component insert .
